javaGOAP

Class GoapAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaGOAP.GoapAction

  • public abstract class GoapAction
extends java.lang.Object
    GoapAction.java --- Superclass for all actions a unit can perform
    Author:
    P H - 28.01.2017

    • Constructor Detail

      • GoapAction

        public GoapAction(java.lang.Object target)
        Parameters:
        target - the target of the action. Since "Object" is being used this is NOT type safe!

    • Method Detail

      • isDone

        protected abstract boolean isDone(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Checks if the current action of the GoapAction Queue is finished. Gets called until it returns true.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is checked for.
        Returns:
        true or false depending on the success of the action. Returning true causes the swap to the next action in the Queue.

      • performAction

        protected abstract boolean performAction(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Gets called when the action is going to be executed by the Unit.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the GoapUnit that is trying to execute the action.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the action was successful.

      • generateCost

        float generateCost(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        This function will be called for each GoapAction in the generation of each Graph to determine the cost for each node in the graph. The two functions called in this function have to be implemented by the Subclass to get the sum of both costs. Differentiating between the base cost and the cost relative to the target gives a proper representation of the work the unit has to do i.e. if it has to travel a large distance to reach its target.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit whose action cost is being calculated.
        Returns:
        the calculated action cost.

      • generateBaseCost

        protected abstract float generateBaseCost(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Defines the base cost of the action.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is being executed from.
        Returns:
        the base cost of the action which is added to the cost relative to the target.

      • generateCostRelativeToTarget

        protected abstract float generateCostRelativeToTarget(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Defines the relative cost of the action.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is being executed from.
        Returns:
        the relative cost of the action in relation to the current target, which is added to the base cost.

      • checkProceduralPrecondition

        protected abstract boolean checkProceduralPrecondition(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Gets called to determine if the preconditions of an action are met. If they are not, the action will not be taken in consideration for the generation of the action graph.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is being executed from.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the action can be taken in the first place.

      • requiresInRange

        protected abstract boolean requiresInRange(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Defines if the unit needs to be in a certain range in relation to the target to execute the action.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is being executed from.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the action requires the unit to be in a certain range near the target.

      • isInRange

        protected abstract boolean isInRange(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function to determine if the unit is in a certain range. Only gets called if the action requires to be in range relative to the target.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the unit the action is being executed from.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the unit is in range to execute the action.
        See Also:
        requiresInRange(IGoapUnit goapUnit)

      • reset

        protected abstract void reset()
        Function used to reset an action. Gets called once the Action finishes or, if the GoapUnit class was used, when the Stack on the FSM gets reseted.

      • getPreconditions

        protected java.util.HashSet<GoapState> getPreconditions()

      • getEffects

        protected java.util.HashSet<GoapState> getEffects()

                               java.lang.String effect,
                               java.lang.Object value)
        Overloaded function for convenience.
        Parameters:
        importance - the importance of the precondition being added.
        effect - the effect of the precondition being added.
        value - the value of the precondition being added.
        See Also:

      • addPrecondition

        protected void addPrecondition(GoapState precondition)
        Add a precondition, which is not already in the HashSet.
        Parameters:
        precondition - which is going to be added to the action.

        Overloaded function for convenience.
        Parameters:
        precondition - the precondition that is being removed.
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the precondition was removed successfully.
        See Also:
        removePrecondition(String preconditionEffect)

        Remove a precondition from the HashSet.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true or false depending if the precondition was removed.
